tool_description:
Check the balance of crypto currency wallet. Supports 13 blockchains:
algorand,    bitcoin,    bsc,    celo,    ethereum,    flow,    one,    klaytn,    kcs,    litecoin,    polygon,    solana,    vet,    xdc,
name: 🔴 CHECK CRYPTO BALANCE 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 CHECK CRYPTO BALANCE 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Balance
api_list.description:
Get crypto wallet balance, supported blockchains:     algorand,    bitcoin,    bsc,    celo,    ethereum,    flow,    one,    klaytn,    kcs,    litecoin,    polygon,    solana,    vet,    xdc,
Send GET request to https://check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/[blockchain]/[wallet]
for example :
https://check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/ethereum/0xc1e42f862d202b4a0ed552c1145735ee088f6ccf
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/ethereum/0xc1e42f862d202b4a0ed552c1145735ee088f6ccf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/{blockchain}/{wallet}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-crypto-balance-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
